

<div align="center">
<h2>
    Minimalist CV for web
</h2>

Inspirated in <a href="https://github.com/midudev/minimalist-portfolio-json">minimalist-portfolio-json by midudev</a> and <a href="https://github.com/BartoszJarocki/cv">CV by Bartosz Jarocki</a>
</p>

## üõ†Ô∏è Stack

- [![Astro Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Astro-BC52EE?logo=astro&logoColor=fff&style=flat)](https://astro.build/) - Static site framework for modern web development.
- [![Typescript Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Typescript-3178C6?logo=typescript&logoColor=fff&style=flat)](https://www.typescriptlang.org/) - Typed JavaScript at Any Scale.
- [![Ninja Keys Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Ninja_keys-333333?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&logoColor=fff&style=flat)](https://github.com/ssleptsov/ninja-keys) - Keyboard shortcuts for web applications.

## üöÄ Installation

1. **Clone repository.**

```bash
git clone git@github.com:IvanBarLem/cv.git
```

2. **Install dependencies.**

```bash
pnpm install
```

3. **Start development server.**

```bash
pnpm dev
```

## üìù Configuration

You can modify the CV data in the `cv.json` file.
